name: The happy dismal town (itch)
description:
Hello!

I wanna show you a detective drama funny game. NOIR cyberpunk themed with lovecraftian story elements. Don't hesitate to try and report bugs! (or warn me of bad English translations).

Type of game :
Narrative, platform, shooter

Language : FR, ENG

Story :
You arrive in a weird city looking for your detective mentor. Follow the investigation, complete the "Wanted Notice" quests or the side quests to make money and evolve the character and advance the investigation, solve the murders and uncover the horrible secret of the city.

Note :
For the demo there is a lot of money to buy everything. And you cant die.

Tips :
-Read description of tools.
-Click on "suggestion" in mission to have advices.

Credit :
-Dev : Strange box tales
-NOIR musics : Rob Cavallo
